009
010package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.StandardIlluminant.D50;
013import static imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.StandardIlluminant.D65;
014
015import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
016
017import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
018
019
020/**
021 * Basic linear RGB color space, related to sRGB by gamma
022 * correction.
023 * Everything is D65, components of all {@code float[]} colors
024 * are supposed to be in [0,1].
025 * This is a singleton class with no public constructors,
026 * use {@link #getInstance()} to obtain the single instance.
027 * 
028 */
029@SuppressWarnings("serial")
030public class LinearRgb65ColorSpace extends CustomColorSpace {
031        
032
033        private static final double[][] Mrgbi = CieUtil.Mrgb65i;
034        public static final double[][] Mrgb = CieUtil.Mrgb65;
035        private static final ChromaticAdaptation catD65toD50 = BradfordAdaptation.getInstance(D65, D50);
036        private static final ChromaticAdaptation catD50toD65 = BradfordAdaptation.getInstance(D50, D65);
037        private static final GammaMappingFunction GammaMap = GammaMappingFunction.sRGB;
038        
039        private static final LinearRgb65ColorSpace instance = new LinearRgb65ColorSpace();
040        
041        public static LinearRgb65ColorSpace getInstance() {
042                return instance;
043        }
044        
045        /** Constructor, non-public */
046        private LinearRgb65ColorSpace() {
047                super(ColorSpace.TYPE_RGB, 3);
048        }
049        
050        // --------------------------------------------------------------------
051
052        @Override       // directly convert non-linear sRGB to linear rgb (D65-based)
053        public double[] fromRGB(double[] srgb) {
054                final double[] rgb = new double[3];
055                for (int k = 0; k < 3; k++) {
056                        rgb[k] = GammaMap.applyInv(srgb[k]);
057                }
058                return rgb;
059        }
060
061        @Override       // directly convert linear rgb (D65-based) to non-linear sRGB
062        public double[] toRGB(double[] rgb) {
063                final double[] srgb = new double[3];
064                for (int k = 0; k < 3; k++) {
065                        srgb[k] = GammaMap.applyFwd(rgb[k]);
066                }
067                return srgb;
068        }
069        
070        public double[] toCIEXYZ65(double[] rgb) {
071                double[] xyz65 = Matrix.multiply(Mrgbi, rgb);
072                return xyz65;
073        }
074
075        @Override       // return D50-based PCS xyz
076        public double[] toCIEXYZ(double[] rgb) {
077                double[] xyz65 = this.toCIEXYZ65(rgb);
078                double[] xyz50 = catD65toD50.applyTo(xyz65);
079                return xyz50;
080        }
081        
082        public double[] fromCIEXYZ65(double[] xyz65) {
083                double[] rgb = Matrix.multiply(Mrgb, xyz65);
084                return rgb;
085        }
086
087        @Override
088        public double[] fromCIEXYZ(double[] xyz50) {
089                double[] xyz65 = catD50toD65.applyTo(xyz50);
090                return this.fromCIEXYZ65(xyz65);
091        }
092        
093        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
094        
095        private static final String[] ComponentNames = {"R", "G", "B"};
096        
097        @Override
098        public String getName (int idx) {
099                return ComponentNames[idx];
100        }
101        
102}
